caseTitle: Khushdil Khan Malik v. Secretary Ministry of Defence and others
tagline: The appellant is under the effective administrative control and management of Education Corps of the Garrison; the order of his promotion was issued by Col. Incharge in active service of the Defence Services; he is undisputedly paid from the Defence Estimates; he is competently a member of the Defence Housing Authority; he was successful in balloting and deposited the seed money/installment and unilateral cancellation of plot is against the principle of natural justice.
